path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Dragon Pool Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and perform sensitive actions even after ownership renouncement.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from reward
findings.description: The owner has privileges to include or exclude addresses from receiving rewards, which could lead to unfair distribution of rewards.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or exclude addresses from fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change dead wallet address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the dead wallet address.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can enable / disable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable or disable swap and liquify functions.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to remain as the owner even after ownership renunciation.
